params.daos: Array containing the DAOs that are involed in creating the token swap
params.deadline: The amount of time between the creation of the swap and the time when it can no longer be executed, in seconds
params.dealId: Deal id for the created token swap
params.metadata: Unique ID that is generated throught the Prime Deals frontend
params.pathFrom: Two-dimensional array containing the tokens flowing from the DAOs into the module
params.pathTo: Two-dimensional array containing the tokens flowing from the module to the DAOs
params.tokens: Array containing the tokens that are involed in creating the token swap

params.dealId: Deal id for the executed token swap
params.metadata: Unique ID that is generated throught the Prime Deals frontend

params._dealId: The dealId of the action (position in the array)

returns._0: bool        A bool flag indiciating whether the action can be executed

params._daos: Array containing the DAOs that are involed in this action
params._deadline: The amount of time between the creation of the swap and the time when it can no longer be executed, in seconds
params._metadata: Unique ID that is generated throught the Prime Deals frontend
params._pathFrom: Two-dimensional array containing the tokens flowing from the DAOs into the module: - First array level is for each token - Second array level is for each dao - Detailed overview on how to configure the array can be found at the TokenSwap struct description
params._pathTo: Two-dimensional array containing the tokens flowing from the module to the DAOs: - First array level is for each token - Second array level is for each dao - Detailed overview on how to configure the array can be found at the TokenSwap struct description
params._tokens: Array containing the tokens that are involed in this action

returns._0: uin32       The dealId of the new token swap

params._dealId: The dealId of the action (position in the array)

params._metadata: Unique ID that is generated throught the Prime Deals frontend

returns.swap: Token swap struct associated with the metadata

params._dealId: The dealId of the action (position in the array)

returns._0: bool         A bool flag indiciating whether token swap has expired

setFeeWallet(address).details: The fee system will be inactive if the feeWallet is set to a zero-address

params._feeWallet: Address of the new fee wallet

FeeChanged(uint32,uint32).notice: This event is emitted when the fee is updated

FeeWalletChanged(address,address).notice: This event is emitted when the fee wallet address is updated

TokenSwapCreated(address,uint32,bytes32,.notice: This event is emitted when a token swap is created

TokenSwapExecuted(address,uint32,bytes32.notice: This event is emitted when a token swap is executed

checkExecutability(uint32).notice: Checks whether a token swap action can be executed, which is the case if all DAOs have deposited

createSwap(address[],address[],uint256[].notice: Create a new token swap action and automatically creates Dao Deposit Manager for each DAO that does not have one

feeWallet().notice: Wallet that is receiving the fees

getTokenswapFromMetadata(bytes32).notice: Returns the TokenSwap struct associated with the metadata

hasDealExpired(uint32).notice: Checks if the deal has been expired

tokenSwaps(uint256).notice: Array of token swaps where the index == dealId

userdoc.notice: Smart contract to handle token swap interactions for PrimeDeals
